summary:
We need to produce JSON with summary, business_intent, keywords list.

We have class MainWindow. It seems to be a GUI main window for an application that deals with file analysis, daemon monitoring (fapd), trust database, rules administration, etc. The methods include toolbar handling, applying JSON file filters, auto save/restore dialog, dirty changesets, packing main content, setting menu sensitivity, unapplied changes, enabling menu items, monitoring daemon, refreshing toolbar, starting daemon monitor, updating daemon status, activating file analyzer, handling destroy, initializing fapd state, various menu activation callbacks (about, analyze, delete event, deploy changes, destroy, start/stop daemon, help, next system, open, profile exec, restore, rules admin, save as, save, start, syslog, trust db, update daemon status). So the class is responsible for the main GUI window of an application that manages system analysis, configuration changes, daemon control, and trust database operations. It handles UI components (toolbar, menus), user actions, and interacts with background daemon (fapd) and file analysis.

We need to produce summary: a concise description of class responsibility and behavior.

Business intent: what business problem it solves: provides user interface for managing system analysis, configuration changes, and daemon control, enabling users to analyze files, apply changes, manage trust database, monitor daemon status, etc.

Keywords: list of relevant terms: GUI, main window, toolbar, menu, daemon monitoring, file analysis, trust database, configuration changes, save/restore, rules administration, syslog, profile execution, auto save, JSON filters, state management.

Make sure not to list method names verbatim. Avoid using method names directly. Use generic terms.

Now produce JSON.

Make sure to start with {{ and end with }} as per example. Provide keys summary, business_intent, keywords.

Let's craft.

Summary: "The class implements the primary graphical interface of the application, constructing the main window, organizing toolbars and menus, and coordinating user interactions with underlying analysis and daemon services."

Business intent: "It enables operators to initiate file analysis, manage configuration changes, control the background daemon, and maintain trust database and rule sets through an integrated UI, streamlining system administration tasks."

Keywords list: ["GUI", "main window", "toolbar", "menu", "daemon control", "file analysis", "configuration management", "trust database", "rules administration", "auto save", "state restoration", "JSON filtering", "system monitoring",
